title: Gillette Deodorant Arctic Ice 70ml
description: Our Gillette Deodorant Arctic Ice 70ml offers 48-hour sweat and odor protection, ensuring you stay fresh all day. It features a fast-drying formula with a cool, refreshing scent. Its non-irritating composition is gentle on your skin, while its compact size makes it perfect for travel. Choose this for a reliable, long-lasting, and invigorating deodorant experience.
